backend/main.mo: Actor implementing access-controlled user profiles, inquiries, WhatsApp queries, shipments, and bookings with various data types and CRUD-like endpoints.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend file paths to short functional descriptions for documentation or tooling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining OKLCH design tokens, light/dark theme variables, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Composes the full single-page site by rendering all major sections between header and footer.
frontend/src/components/site/gallery/Gal: Modal lightbox that displays a selected image and closes on escape or dialog close.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Ab: Renders an About section with company description and a grid of core values with icons.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Bo: Booking form section handling validation, submission, and auto-reset using custom hooks.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Co: Contact form section supporting email submission and WhatsApp message generation with validation.
Displays courier partners and enables sending WhatsApp inquiries after backend logging.
Shows service coverage areas and delivery info with icons and styled cards.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Ga: Image gallery that opens selected images in a lightbox for preview.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/He: Renders the homepage hero with marketing text, CTA buttons, and a banner image, including smooth-scroll to contact.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/La: Provides a form to fetch shipping label details by tracking number and supports previewing and printing labels.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Se: Displays a grid of service cards describing logistics offerings with icons and feature lists.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Tr: Implements shipment tracking with a search form, status display, and error/not-found states using tracking API data.
Footer with brand info, quick links including Gallery, services list, contact details, and social icons.
Responsive header with desktop and mobile navigation including Gallery and smooth-scroll behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, stored identity loading, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useLabelDetails.ts: Fetches label details for a tracking number via the backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useOneShotTimeout.ts: Runs a one-time timeout callback when a trigger becomes true, preventing duplicate scheduling across renders.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitBooking.ts: Submits booking data through the backend actor and invalidates booking queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitInquiry.ts: Defines a React Query mutation hook that submits an inquiry via the actor and invalidates the inquiries cache.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitWhatsAppQuer: Provides a mutation hook to submit WhatsApp-related queries through the actor and invalidate the whatsappQueries cache.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrackingInfo.ts: Fetches shipment tracking information using React Query and the actor, keyed by tracking number.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom color variables, components, dark mode settings, and print-specific layout rules.
frontend/src/lib/validation/booking.ts: Validates booking form fields and returns error messages for missing or invalid input.
frontend/src/lib/validation/contactInqui: Validates contact inquiry form fields including name, phone, email, and message.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers, importing global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for parsing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Builds WhatsApp message text and generates wa.me URLs with encoded content.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color variables, plugins, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, existing features, pending requests, and metadata for the gallery feature work.
